name: Neotrace
description:
MADE FOR THE BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2

Neotrace is a chill puzzle-platformer where you control two players. The catch? You can only control one at a time. You start off controlling one player, and then rewind, and then you are controlling the second player, while the first player is moving in the same manner as you did before rewinding.

ESC to pause

All Other Controls are found in the in-game tutorial

Music was made with Bosca Ceoil

Sounds were edited from creative commons/public domain + sfxr

How I made the rewind sound effect: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4/topic/908697/how-i-created-a-rewind-sound-effect

Heavily inspired by Replay: VHS is not Dead https://store.steampowered.com/app/333490/Replay__VHS_is_not_dead/
